endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available rooms with their current status and attributes.
Create a new booking for a specific room by providing customer information and desired dates.
Fetch booking details using the unique booking identifier.
Update the booking information such as dates or accommodations.
Cancel an existing booking with the specified booking identifier.
Obtain a list of current promotions and offers for room bookings.
Submit feedback or reviews for a past stay or the booking process.
Query the prices based on room type, location, and date range.
Check the availability of rooms for a specific date.
Set up third-party integrations by providing required credentials and preferences.
